lead_paragraph: A Miami judge on Thursday temporarily blocked media access to any more video images of a semi-clad Justin Bieber filmed while the teenage pop singer was in police custody last month after his arrest for driving under the influence.

headline.main: No Media Access to Images of Semi-Clad Bieber-For Now: Judge
headline.print_headline: No Media Access to Images of Semi-Clad Bieber-For Now: Judge

snippet: A Miami judge on Thursday temporarily blocked media access to any more video images of a semi-clad Justin Bieber filmed while the teenage pop singer was in police custody last month after his arrest for driving under the influence....
